content.detailedDescription:
This is an update to the black triangle i reported over my house on june 28, 2008.

for nearly two months before my sighting, i had been feeling severly depressed over the fact that the human race and all of the beautiful country and animals could quite possibly be detroyed by us or nature. in fact, i was very troubled about the massive caldura (volcano) under yellowstone park could erupt killing millions. the morning of my sighting, i woke up and heard in my head a voice not my own. this voice said, "do not worry yourself, if anything did happen, you and the ones you love will be safe." immediately, this depression lifted its heavy yolk off my sholders. i became very aware and took these words to heart. i got ready for work and when i went outside to get in my car, that is when i saw the black triangle in the cloud. please look up the details, event sighting date 6-28-08, black triangle, texas

well, two days later while i slept in my bed, i was awaken by something in my room. i looked around but couldn't see anything due to a very bright light shining on me. i became aware that i was lying down, but didn't feel that i was in my room. suddenly, i felt a presence over my left shoulder and could feel something touching my left thigh. when i looked up and over my shoulder, i saw three entities standing there. it is hard to describe them, but i would say that they looked like old wrinkly men, sort of like those in the movie fire in the sky.

i asked them what they were doing and one of them replied, "we are taking something from you for the future." the next thing i remembered was waking up in my bed. i told my mother about this and she said that that night she was sleeping on the floor and she felt herself fighting with something and remembered pulling off tubing attached to her body. she remembers the sensation of being stood straight up and on to her feet from a position where she started on her back.

the next night again i dreamed of the light, but this time it seemed even brighter than before. that's all i remebered from that night, but upon telling my mother this, she too saw a bright light from behind her. it was brass/copper color and very intense. i never told her the color and from where it was shining, but it was just like mine that night. i told her hers was the same as mine.

it's very difficult to describe how i feel about the whole matter. it's freightening and exciting at the same time. i don't feel scared. i'm more afraid of humans than i am of them.
content.summary: Update: blk triangle in houston heights

content.detailedDescription:
i decided to go on my roof to take photos of the brilliant red sunset. after a few minutes shooting up there i noticed a dark object moving across the sky from west to east.  it was not moving in a straight line and was changing speeds.  at first, with my bare eyes, i couldn't really make out the shape. it kind of looked like a chopper at first, but did not move like one, nor did it make any noise.  i took as many shots of the object as i could in the 20 seconds or so that i had.  it was so high up that i lost it for awhile, but in the end i managed to get 15 photos of the object. after, i took a closer look at the photos on my computer and quickly realized that i was dealing with 2 ufo's.  another object, even higher and further away, was also captured in the background. also moving, but appeared just as a bright white light.  i could tell it was moving from the landmarks on the ground in the photos. i took all the photos in the same position.  so i know it wasn't a star.  
                    anyway, the object i focused in on was black in color and shaped like an upright cylinder with asymetrical limbs off the sides.  the top of the object had a multi pointed surface like cones or pyramids. there also appeared to be a single reddish light on it as well, but it might have been from a reflection of the sunset.  i only noticed these features after zooming in on the computer.  i will send 3 of the 15 photos to you guys so you can judge for yourself. i can send the rest on your request.
                    i am hoping that i'm not the only one to have seen this.  there must have been tons of people shooting that amazing sunset.  anyway, keep up the good work.  the truth is out there.
content.summary: Odd shaped cylinder with pointed parts and limbs.

content.detailedDescription: Went out to my back yard to see if i could get any meter footage around 9:50 pm. was cloudy night due to dust from wind i think? but, one "star" to the south east very high in the sky caught my eye right away! this star/ufo/? seemed to move higher in the sky and get very small then, it seem to come closer as if it was zooming in like a camera would and get bigger and bright to the naked eye? so i started to video tape it with my sony mini dvd 80x zoom. i taped this thing for a good 30 min-45min zooming in and out, in both night shot mode and regular mode! what i have on tape is incredible to say the least to the naked eye this thing looks like just another big bright star but on tape it has a distinct chevronie/diamond shape from about 30/40x zoom but at 80x zoom this thing takes on a whole different shape, color, and life! it dance like a worm then splits and criss./crosses itself the energy and speed of the light/lights it puts out is unexplainable, then in part of the footage you can see blackshadows on the top and bottom of this thing and the lights seem to dance in  between the 2 shadows? i would like to have someone take a look at my footage and either tell me that my camera was malfuctioning or that my footage is just normal footage of a regular star and that zooming in on star will cause what i have on tape. or that the footage i have is truly unexplainable footage of something not yet known or identified? computer is a mac and my camera is a sony i have tried in the past to download video from my camera to my computer but have never been successful can someone please help me or point me in the right direction to someone who can take  a look at what i have! i am not a some crackpot trying to pull a prank, i am a college educated school teacher who would just like to try and find out what the hell i saw and have on tape?
content.shape: Boomerang,  Cigar,  Chevron,  Fireball,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: Can't explain in 25 words

content.detailedDescription:
I was 12 at the time of this event. it was a clear texas sky night with little to no breeze. i live in a rural area about ten miles outside of the nearest town (glen rose, tx). i feel this is a relevant sighting especially since a nuclear power plant is located a short ways from where i take residence (comanche peak nuclear power plant). the plant is in fact in veiwing range of my residence since i live on a hill. my house is located just off highway 67. i was outside shooting basketballs for a short time while i noticed an unfamiliar humming noise. i dont think the noise was being emmited from the object directly but actually coming from the object breaking through the thick air. the object was clearly triangle in shape as it blocked out the bright stars and much of the night sky. small lights could be seen flickering as would a light on an airliner's wing tip. there were only blue, red, and white lights emmiting from the objects underside. it was flying directly perpindicular to the highway as it slowly made its way out of sight. as to its hight off the ground, i could safely say it was about 60-70 feet up. i feel this is a good estimate in correlation to my house and it seemed to be just above the roof. i felt no emotional distress nor anxiety as the object passed over my head, only intrigue. the object flew in a straight line. in a mere five minutes the object faded out of sight, oddly in a direction that would pass within a few miles of the nuclear power plant. i have spoken to many members of our community about my sighting and most can tell me about their own strange occurences in the region. the object was clearly solid and made of a metallic substance. it flew apprx. 40 miles an hour and very smoothely. it had no apparent struggle to keep airborne. it was around 60 feet long and at its tail 60 feet wide, a perfect equalateral triangle. it very well could have been a military designed craft as jet fighters frequent the airspace around my house and the power plant.  

just recently a string of ufos were reported and recorded in stephenville, tx. these sightings were covered in depth by media sources around the state and even the nation. simply typing in "stephenville ufo" on google will result in a barrage of pages covering the event. strangly, ufos around here are not uncommon. if anything, they can be considered almost normal. for any ufo fanatic or skeptic, this area should be labeled a definate hot spot. 

i researched my sighting on the internet and found that triangle ufos are spotted quite frequently on major highways such a mine. some call them "black triangles". research should definately be done on these occurences. my own belief is that these are simply goverment contolled crafts thats existence has not yet been released to the public.
content.summary: Traingle shaped ufo spotted over highway 67

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our deck looking in the direction of cassiopeia for the perseids meteor shower. it was a clear sky with a lot of ambient background light. we had been out for about 15 minutes and had just seen a good long meteor trail traveling east to west.  i picked up my cell phone to call my son to tell him what we saw since he was watching too, from his porch in another state.  while on the phone with him i noticed something moving in the sky traveling almost overhead roughly ssw from just above cassiopeia. i blurted out, "what the heck is that?" i told my son that i was looking at a ufo.  my wife saw it at the same time. we both followed it for about 10 seconds until it disappeared just above the horizon. it was triangular in shape and moved very smoothly with no noise. it did not change directions.  there were 4 dim, non-flashing lights on the bottom of it; one in each corner of the triangle and one in the middle. the lights illuminated enough of the bottom to make out the shape. it seemed very low in the sky to me. from where we live, there is continuous airline traffic into o'hare and out of midway, and we are also close enough to dupage county airport to see private jets and props go in and out. we are very familiar with what planes look like at night and saw many of them during our meteor shower watching, but this ufo was nothing like any of them.  the elevation of the ufo seemed about the same as the jets queueing up over aurora for o'hare, maybe a little lower.  both of us were a little spooked because we have never seen anything like this before and never imagined that we would ever see a ufo. i would like to know if anyone else saw this in our area. if it becomes indentified, please let me know what it was.
content.summary: Triangular ufo with 4 dim, non-flashing lights traveling from n to s; no noise

content.detailedDescription: Well i was driving home when i seen what seemed to be a stationary craft, that's what immediately caught my eye. then when i looked close the light scheme was not anything i had ever seen before on a plane at night, it was red, yellow and what looked to be white one right after another. i called my friend a mile away he stepped out and spotted the object as well, but in a matter of 15-20secs it was out of sight. then about 10mins later the same friend as well as another went back out to take a second look, this time they spotted two of these crafts with the same lighting. i have seen similar reports, this is very interesting.
content.summary: Red, yellow, white lights flashing on craft in the nights sky

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to my back porch to see if the sky was clear enough to view the meteor shower later that night. at the time the skies were clear. to my the nnw i saw what appeared at first to be a large twinkling star, but i knew i had not seen it before. i thought maybe it was an aircraft, or possibly a sattelite, but it was remaining stationary. i almost shrugged it off, but just before i turned to go back inside it began moving in a southward direction fairly slowly. as it moved closer the twinkling i thought i saw earlier was clearly lights. at first they seemed to be flashing, as lights on a plane would, but i knew it clearly could not have been a plane because it remained stationary for several minutes when i first saw it. as it came even closer i could see that the lights were actually rotating around the object. the lights were red, green, blue, yellow and white. the object never got close enough to make out an actual shape, but from the way the lights rotated it appeared to be round at the edges. at that point it stopped briefly, but after a few seconds it began to go back in the direction it had just came from. it went almost all the way back to where i had first spotted it and stopped again. at that point i caught a glimpse of a small, but bright white light out of the corner of my eye to the east. i turned to look thinking it might be one of the persied meteors, but it was moving too slow, and the light was pulsing. it was moving directly toward the first object and continued until it was just below and to the right of the first object. it appeared to be considerably smaller thatn the first object, but i believe both objects were very far away and were definitely at a very high altitude making it hard to determine the size of either object. the second object remained in that position, below and to the right of the first object for probably nearly a minute or so. at that point the light from the second object stopped pulsing and just seemed to fade out. a few minutes later the first object moved quickly to the north and disappeared.
content.summary: 2 objects, largest one w/ rotating lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking outside of the back door at my house, i just go outside to look at the sky every now and then, ususaly at night because im a night owl.. lol when i first saw it i thought it was a plane it first came into view behind the limbs of a tree then i noticed once it had cleared the tree that it was round... like perfectly round.. it was wobeling back and fourth a little but the thing i thought was the weirdest was it made no noise.. and it want very far off the ground... either that or it was huge.. but it didnt seem like it was far away.. i finalyl ost sight of the object when it got to the line of the roof of my house, i went fr4om the back door out to the porch but it never came over the other side... i wastched for about 3 minutes thinking maybe it had turned but i walked out into the yard and looked and didnt see anything anywhere... and that would of had to of been one hell of a turn
content.summary: Round, white lights, silent

content.detailedDescription:
My children and i were visiting my mother and stayed overnight on july 14, 2009, in everson, pa. 
 that evening i went outside to get some fresh night air around 9 pm est. i love to stargaze so looking into the night sky is common nature to me. i was looking into the southeastern corner of the sky when i noticed a triangular object that was not twinkling like a star would. i stood there watching it hover. i watched it for a good 20 minutes as i continued to walk the block. it was definitely not a star as i noticed it would move just ever so slightly, but not quick, nor did it twinkle. 

after watching it stay within the same area of the sky and thinking it may be a ufo i decided to go back inside. i didn't say anything to my teen girls at the time, thinking they may call me crazy. a couple hours later they went to bed, but were still up talking and apparently they were also looking out the bedroom window and spotted this bright hovering object as well. by this time it was nearly midnight. i was in the living room watching tv when my girls come running downstairs and through the house to go outside and they were both gitty with excitement and chanting "there's a ufo", repeatedly.

so i follow them outside to let them show me and they point to the very same area of the sky i had found the ufo at least 2 to 3 hours prior. we all agreed it was not a star and not shaped like an airplane, or any type of human created aircraft. it was to us a ufo. unfortunately i do not own a video camera, nor does my mother so i was not able to record this on film.

my youngest daughter said to me that i need to report this to our mutual friend and avid ufo fanatic from chicago. so i did and he told me to come here to the website to officially report the siting. i have to thank roger marsh for informing me of this website and for his latest posting of allison cruse's murrysville ufo siting that she witnessed and videotaped on july 10, 2009. everson is just a 45 minute drive southeast of murrysville.
content.summary: Ufo spotted first by me , then hours later by my kids.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from work, and stopped at the grocery store which is one street over and two blocks down from my house. i left the grocery store and drove those two blocks, then just before my turn, i noticed something large, metallic and stationary in the sky.  it was some distance from my location to the west.

i'm about 100 miles eastish from lax, and maybe 15 miles westish from march afrb, so i frequently see planes. the object i saw just now appeared to be 2-3 times the size of airplanes i would normally see in that part of the sky. however, i simply have no way of judging how far away the object really was, it may have appeared larger because it was closer, i don't know.

it was metallic, that's what caught my eye - it was shiny. it was not a disk, it appeared cigar shaped. it was not moving.  i did not hear any noise.

so i'm now about a block away from my house. i pulled over to look at it, to make sure it didn't just appear stationary because i was moving. it was not moving. so i jumped into my car and quickly drove the block home, ran into the house for my camera - and my son as a witness - when i came back out, it was gone :(

this occurred during daylight hours.

i am going to start carrying a camera and binoculars in my car for sure!
content.summary: Noticed a large metallic staionary object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Sometime on or shortly before july 27,2009 a report was made by an eyewitness of an object which fell out of the sky and caused a wave of 30 ft when it hit a lake, near forest lake mn. object is still there on the bottom. incident caused a dive team from lower st croix valley fire dept to be activated to locate object. water was very murky and team was not able to locate object or identify object. washington county, minnesota , sheriff was involved in incident. i was not a witness but am aware of the dive team activation.
content.summary: Water landing of unknown object still there

content.detailedDescription:
I was just getting done with our midnight basketball game and decided to stand out on my driveway in town and watch to see if i could spot any meteors from the shower this night.  it was supposed to be the heaviest night for the showers and thought i may be able to catch a few.  i looked to the ne and just above a tree top was a very bright star like object that was flashing red, blue and yellow.  at first i thought it may be a jet or helicopter but it was stationary except seemed to be moving very slowly to the ne (as in only a few degrees in a 40 minute time period).  a few times it seemed to jump up and down but i was staring so hard at the thing that i am not sure if it was my eyes playing tricks on me or not.  it was very odd because i've never seen a "star" strobing these colors before.  i watched the thing from about 1:50am until about 2:30am and finally just got bored and tired and went in for bed.  
i work 2nd shift and am usually home around midnight each night.  each night i take the time to scan the skies and this is new to me.  it's hard to explain what it was (other than as a strobing star) or if it was anything abnormal but i saw a report on here from chicago with somebody who sounds like they spotted the same thing i did!  so it prompted me to report it.
even though i am not sure what it was, it left me feeling very confused...Like it just didn't seem like it was something that is usually there or that belonged.  i knew it was something different.  still thinking about it as a matter of fact.
content.summary: Blue, red, yellow bright flashing star-like object in ne sky over southwest michigan

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i and our roommate were out side watching the meteor shower, after about 30-45 of beening outside seeing a few meteors (5-6) my room mate pointed up and said theres one, as soon as that was said we looked up and all realized that it was not one, we could clearly see i dark triangle shape with a  dim light in all three corners, there was no bight lights or strobes on it,i could not judge how big it was or how high it was, but if it was the size of jet liner i would have to say it was flying pretty low, we also herd zero sounds coming from it. as we live next to ft. hood and 2 airports we see planes and helicopter on almost a daily basises, but this was something different that none of us have see before.
content.summary: Black triangle with dim lights

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i were expecting a bus at 18:30 o'clock on a small town, when suddenly my mom looked at the sunset sky and saw a strange bright silver object, moving slowly coming from the southeast, the object stopped right over a mountain looking for a place to land near some high voltage towers, i was stunned and speechless staring the silver object hovering in one place, it hold the position about 10 minutes then the object suddenly started to fall slowly, the "landing" lasted another 10 minutes until the object disappeared behind the mountain.
this is the first time we saw something like this, we have many flights in our sky but this one doesn't seems to be a conventional aircraft. i asked many people about this kind of aerial phenomena but only two guys, friends, saw something very weird in the same direction months ago, "we saw a weird intense dark green light illuminating a small portion of the night sky for few seconds" they described it as well.

pd: the mountains are 3.5 miles from our point of view.
content.summary: Bright silver object hovering

content.detailedDescription:
0n 06-19-07 at approximately 10:00 pm i observed the strangest thing i had ever seen. two fairly bright white lights moving in tandem in the northern sky above denver colorado. the two lights were the size and intensity of the bright star sirius. the night was beautiful and clear, the moon was hanging large and low on the horizon. these objects or object turned southeast and flew directly over my house and then suddenly vanished. 

i was standing at my open rear door of my house when the sound of an approaching helicopter caught my attention, as usual with any low flying aircraft, i would go outside to watch for it. as soon as i stepped out onto my rear deck my attention was diverted to two bright lights approaching from the north. at first i thought the lights were stars and stationary, but then i soon realized they were moving in my direction. they were moving slowly in tandem as if two planes were flying in formation, one in front of the other. this struck me as very odd so i continued to watch them. the two lights were approaching me from a slight angle and they never once deviated laterally from their position. they continued heading in my direction. i stood there trying to understand what it was that i was looking at. as it over flew my house, i ran through the house and called for my teenage son to come to the front door to observe this as well. the two of us stood watching this thing cruise overhead silently and almost effortlessly. we both stood motionless trying to understand what it was we were watching. within a few seconds the two lights flashed off in unison and it was all over. 

the object appeared to be close; however, it had no discernable shape. the object made absolutely no sound. the space and distance between the two lights can be measured by extending one full arm length and turning your hand at a 90 degree angle. one hand length. the area in which this thing traveled penetrated heavily regulated airspace, (class bravo airspace) for dia. this portion of class b airspace has a floor of 8000 feet msl and a ceiling of 14,500 msl. the object was in this air space and had also flown in between centennial (kapa) and buckley afb airspace. all three are manned by radar.  i am an instrument rated private pilot and i think i have a pretty good understanding of what airplanes look and sound like. this was no airplane, as this object had none of the required position lights / navigation lights or strobes that one would recognize as local aviation. the object was not a small dimly lit fast moving satellite, nor was it a commonly observed meteor streaking across our celestial heavenly body, and no, it was no weather balloon. i don���t know what this thing was that my son and i observed, but it left a bad taste in our mouths.
content.summary: Two fairly bright white lights moving in tandem in the northern sky above denver, colorado.

content.detailedDescription: The event was witnessed by a co-worker. my co-worker was leaving our office at about 8:00 pm. it was already dark outside and she happened to glance up and saw a disc shaped object in the sky. the object had flashing lights. in our line of work we used sony madvica camaras and she was carriyng her camara at that time. she filmed the object for a few seconds. i've attached the image she recorded on her camara for your analysis. note that the recording has sound aswell. please share with me the results of your analysis if you find something intersting as i have no way to further anylize the image. if you have any questions feel free to email me, i prefer that you email me if you need to contact me.
content.summary: A disc shaped object with flashing lights was observed hovering in the sky

content.detailedDescription: On july 5th, my famitly and i were sitting out side. when we noticed something floating in the sky. i would not really say it was floating, it was just sitting there for about 15-20 minutes. then it just went up in to the clouds.  it looked kind of like a person. but not real sure. that is the only time we have seen it. i did take 3 pics of it. the are pretty good pics.
content.summary: Something floating in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the way home from work and was taking random photographs from my car. if the weather is good i always have the moon roof open and stick my arm out and take photos. while reviewing the photos later i found this white sphere. in a photo taken 4 seconds earlier of the same location the white sphere does not appear in the photograph.

i was using my trusty nikon coolpix s630 camera.
content.summary: White sphere captured on camera while driving down the road

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting at the kitchen island looking out our large window at anclote island getting ready for lunch.  my wife got up to go to the kitchen sink and after looking to the south she said ���what the hell are those things���. i jumped up and looked out the window from her view and said ���it���s not three flocks of birds and we don���t have anything that big that can fly���. what we could see about 2 miles away across open water and 4-5 hundred foot above the tree line off baileys bluff were 3 large flying triangles. the first was the size of tampa foot ball stadium the next in line directly behind the first was one of the same only ��� the first one in size the one directly behind the first and second was a third one with wings that were about the size of the playing field at tampa if you include both in zone areas (150 yards mol). i got out our binoculars we keep in the kitchen drawer by the sink that we use for looking at birds close up and was amazed at what i viewed. at the bottoms on all 3 was black moving smoke that kept recycling in a well defined coronal field of many colors. the tops of all 3 where low profile looking almost like the color of the sky but were slightly off color and well defined by a coronal discharge. i then handed the binoculars to my wife and went to open the glass sliding door so we could go into the back yard. the triangles were now about straight out by the anclote island heading n/w and we lost sight of them over the gulf when our sight was blocked by our neighbor���s roof line. they flew quickly covering about a 7-8 mile radius in a little over 4 min without any sound at all. my wife then made the comment that they were trying real hard to be invisible but they blew it because there was no doubt what we both had just seen. i have had many encounters with almost every close friend and some family members. i have had many encounters since childhood over in orlando, but this was my wife of 20 years first but not her last. she has always complained in the past that she spends more time with me than any other person because we work together and our offices are 5 foot apart but never had she seen one. my response to her was always you have to go outside at night to see them and then i teased her about them making a very special viewing just for her in the day time so she could see them from inside our home. she was quite stunned over how close and how large they were in the day time getting close to noon on a very clear day in pasco. i then had to explain that these triangles were the biggest ufos i ever heard of and then said to her that at least you did not have to look at the blinding lights me and my friends had to look at over the years to see the ufos we had encountered .Gg
content.summary: My wife and i encountered 3 black to blue large flying triangles over the gulf of mexico

content.detailedDescription: We saw a glowing orb of light travelling at approx 50-60 mph at a height of no more than 200 feet, it travelled in a straight line without changing velocity or direction, it could not have been more than 10 feet in diameter.It was totally silent and glowed a bright orange colour, we saw it for between 2 and 3 minutes.
content.summary: Small (10feet) orange orb seen.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my house, looking directly above me to see if the meteor shower had picked up enough to warrant getting out a lawn chair. i saw what i thought was a satellite moving from north to south across the sky at about the same speed as a normal satellite.  i focused my attention on the object but sd i watched the "satellite," it suddenly flashed bright enough to cause shadows on the ground, and took off in a totally new direction at an incredible rate across the sky before disappearing completely.  the only reason i bothered to report this event was that i saw that someone else relatively near my location also reported a sighting that matches mine exactly.
content.summary: What appeared to be a satellite suddenly flashed incredibly bright and took off in a new direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went outside to enjoy the meteor shower about 10:30 pm central time. aproxamately 15 minutes later julie pointed out a dim moving light in the eastern sky. it appeared to be a satellite(i have spent many hours at the beach and have seen hundreds of satellites). we watched the object for about 1 minute as it moved from north to south. suddenly the object became very bright for aproxamately 2 seconds then dimmed to a lower magnitude then it origionaly was and instantly changed direction heading to the south east and sped out of sight.
as i stated earlier i have seen hundreds of satellites but i have never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Dim star like object in eastern sky moving slowly north to south got real bright then sped off to the south east

content.detailedDescription:
I was at fiends house in waterford mich. less than 2mi from the airport. we had been playing croquet and we were sitting on the deck talking. i looked up and noticed a stationary object in the sky. i usually keep an eye to the sky. i called everyones attention to it, there were four of us at the time. it was clearly not moving, there were trees near enough to the line of sight to judge by. we watched it for 5 or 6 minutes and it never moved, we started to think it could have been a star or planet but we were looking almost due north, i knew it was not a planet. there were a few very high clouds and one was drifting toward it. i thought this would give us a reference to its height. when the cloud reached it, we could see that it was lower than the cloud. the main part of the cloud passed over and we could see that the lower, wispier parts of it were
below the object. i am not a good judge of distance. a northwest jet passed over (orange tail) and i would say it was about half as high as the object.
i went to the car and got my binoculars, we passed them around and all agreed it was a round object. it finally started drifting to the east, almost across the wind, then it would move north. it zig-zagged like that for while until it was behind the trees and we lost track of it. it could have been a weather balloon but that does not explain it remaining stationary for so long. it sort of made me feel happy to see it, like it was beneficent or something.
content.summary: Bright white (luminous?) appeared elongated but was round through binoculars

content.detailedDescription: I'll just say this : over the past years 45 yrs i have seen various craft operating down here just over the ground. most were at nightin remote areas but one good one was during the mid morning. it was a silvery metallic craft that was performing maneuvers, and, as if gravity was not an issue.  the ones i saw at night were out in a very remote area of nth east nevada 2 yrs consecutive yrs. both & the same were very close in the distinct order of 6 to 8 red & white small lights. these order of lights in the shape of some type of craft didn't emit any sound, as the night was extremely quiet, and no moon. anyways i've come a long ways and for the past 26 yrs i have had in my possession the plans for a propulsion system that describes an altogether revolutionary new way of propelling a space-vehicle. this new revolutionary propulsion system is a one-of-a-kind that nothing else can compete with.  there is nothing else like it either being constructed or proposed, and it will operate the way i describe in the plans unlike any system that may presently be under consideration or proposed as a viable means of propulsion. i do not have a patent on this system but i am the inventor and have the original stamped documents that were returned at my request from the doe (dept of energy), from 1983 to 1986.  simply put, they were not interested and/or could not encourage me with this type of system, as it was not acceptable under the energy related inventions criteria/guidelines because it purported to operate on a self sustaining basis.  i simply must state for the record that the fundamental principle by which this system operates is supported by a mathematical formula/equation that specifically dictates a positive powerful result. the doe was simply not interested in any system or device that doesn't produce a substantial reliable energy source/supply for a large populace.  the system i propose is capable of operating on a self sustaining basis and does not claim to produce energy for a large populace. this system will produce & maintain what i have come to refer in certain terms as an "independent state of light energy/propulsion". it will basically utilize powerfully efficient materials w/ specific properties that can convert mass to energy. it is done in a very simple yet complex manner that essentially creates a condition or state of propulsion that can powerfully propell a newly designed type of vehicle/craft.  in closing ;  what i need to do is to build a relatively good small working prototype to prove the validity of the system, to show the potential i know it will deliver.  this system will enable a newly designed vehicle/craft with the on-demand continuous inertia/propulsion that will enable various maneuvers to be performed, such as  hovering, and accelerating to tremendous speeds into deep outer reaches of space in the sublight range (a percentage of the speed of light).  i am quite confident if i could either have access to a small but adequately equipped facility w/ several qualified engineers, i could produce a working prototype of the system.  in  5 to 10 yrs i could develope the means of the ultimate propulsion that would send mankind on his way into space that might not otherwise had been possible.  i am confident this system will not only work but will meet and beat all expectations, in not only dramatically reducing the amount of travel-time involved space exploration endeavors, but in the expansion of the human race to other worlds.  i am convinced that the ultimate goal of traveling space like never before can be obtained, and will not only surpass everything else that claims to, but exceed it by light years.   can you assist me in my endeavor to build the one & only propulsion system that will completely change the way we presently think about traveling space in time?.... there is only one possible viable means of propulsion that is enabling advanced civilizations the ability to travel interstellar space. it is more than highly likely that the biological dependencies of the past (our present) has long since been rendered obsolete, whereby the things that once dictated terms for survival have been completely done-away with. the one & only system that will produce an altogether revolutionary new form of energy will work unlike anything now being proposed or considered as a propulsion system.   so-called antigravity, ion charged gas, solar sails, rockets, or any of the many commonly referred to potential means of propelling a spacecraft, can hope to accomplish what the system that i propose can.  it will accomplish what all the others can't hope to by utilizing a rather simple principle by applying an imbalance of weight to a specifically engineered/designed spinning rotor/armature center. the formula for determining centrifugal or centripetal force basically translates from to a 4 x's factor, and so, a 1-lb object spinning at 60,000 rpm's will exert a rough pulling-force of  4,000 lbs (2 tons) or considerably more depending on the specifications or dimensions.  in understanding this verifiable fundamental principle, it would be relatively easy to applied it to a system to create what otherwise would not be.  a substantial amount of  pulling-force could be maintained, enough to at least equal if not overtake the entire weight of an altogether newly designed vehicle/craft.  the spinning rotor center would basically resemble (in size) an average sized automobile tire and consist basically of 4 ea even slices (figuretively). 1/4 would be of a specific weight and 2 lbs lighter, w/ electromagnetic induced properties (light side or live weight). this opposite the other 1/4 heavier in weight by 2 lbs w/ no properties (heavy side or dead weight). so the diference in weight between the two opposite 1/4's is 2-lbs.  by surrounding the specifically imbalanced spinning rotor center with a housing of electromagnetics, in sections.  the pulling force exerted could be compensated (counter balanced) and would spin as a perfectly balanced rotor. this would enable the production of the necessary energy to propell an altogether new type of vehicle/craft. a substantial source of electric energy will be needed to supply the power to the entire system, but research should provide all the essential inputs & outputs and/or enable powering up & down as needed. keep in mind, that electromagnets have the potential to pull a thousand x's their own weight. even tho that is based on direct-contact it should be possible to obtain a significant percentage of that.  to continue, 3 or 4 entire systems would be needed to make a full-scale vehicle/craft fully functional or operational.  all systems would be situated parallel to each other and spin in a vertical position. each system would carry a part of the total vehicle weight. with this configuation, any and all maneuvers could be performed such as hovering, and/or accelerating & decelerating, and/or reach speeds in the sublight range, in deep space. propulsion is obtained and/or controlled by regulating energy to various select electromagnetic sections surrounding the s.R.C. via a t.O.S.(timing order sequence). the surrounding electromagnetics would consist of 12 ea sections, whereby 3 would equal in dimension the light side of the s.R.C., to interact with it, while compensating the imbalance. whatever surrounding sections are timed, will result in movement/propulsion to the opposite direction. it would be done in rapid sequence thus allowing motorization to recover enough to maintain the rpm's. the system/s could be designed and/or configured to produce a powerfully efficient pulling-force, that could enable it to exceed the t.V.W (total vehicle weight) by several times, if not more. this would enable maneuvers to be carried-out in the extreme, and would be measured as g-force, (1- g = earths gravity). the production of g-force could number in the 25 to 50 range.  one would not have to accelerate more than one can withstand, but it might be to ones advantage to be able to have the capacity to.  if you know of anyone who is genuinely interested in producing the one & only means of propulsion that will verify the existence of advanced civilizations and/or enable us to travel space in the extreme, please let me know,, or let them know about me.  the system that will totally completely revolutionize how we travel space & time, will produce an what will become to be known as an "independent state of light energy/propulsion & eventually being".... it could simply be referred to as "light energy technology".   theres only one way to do it, and if its done right there will be no mistaking it for anything else... it is literally a "time machine' that can travel the vast distances to other stars that may have a earth-type planet similar to ours that is either presently supporting intelligent life and/or has long since supported this life, but has progressed to immortality-thru-technology, and is now up in the space above us, as we (humankind) live & breath, and go about our rather restricted limited temporary lives.  i have little doubt that our civilization has a god aweful long way to go before it attains/obtains this whole other complete independent heavenly exquisite technological state of being, like the majority of the human populace will likely never know or might even care to. thank you for your time.  sincerely, loren heyer
content.summary: Disk shaped craft & craft-shaped in order of numerous lights.

content.detailedDescription:
At approx 22 45 pm myself and four over witnesses who at the time where all out in our own gardens and are all next door to each other.

we where all outside looking for meteors the sky was clear apart from a few passing clouds as i was looking up to the north i glanced west wards and noticed a very bright orange red glowing light quite high in the sky as a few clouds did obscure the object once or twice but we all had a very clear view for the most part.
the object then seemed to be heading closer to us and desending in an easterly direction, i then ran into the house to grab a camera which is digital when i turned it on i had no memory on the sd card left due to a weekend away. i had another sd card in the house but if i had gone back to get it i would have missed the object coming over  so i stayed outside with the other witnesses disapointed not to get the picture but shocked in the moment and what i thought we saw.
when i arrived back in the garden seconds later it had stopped glowing and was banking off to the north towards pontypool this is when we could all make out the underbelly of the craft, disc shaped with lots of dim white lights close to the outer edge.
it was dim probably because of the distance and the object was starting to head away from us while it banked but you could still see it and to me it seemed  to have a gray underbelly with a slight transluesence.
as it disappared over the rooftop we all ran out to the front of the houses and ran north up the main road to see if we could spot it but it had gone.

i cant believe what i have seen having had a interest in u.F.O's for many years i never thought in a million years would i ever see anything but we all saw this thing and we are all shocked and stunned none of the witnesses can explain what we have all seen with our own eyes, the sighting lasted maybe three to four minutes we where all running around the gardens in total disbelieve of what we had just seen.
myself i could not sleep much that night and we all stayed out until cloud
cover stopped us viewing at around midnight.

there was no sound from the object it just drifted slowly off north just above us at around 45 degrees maybe a little higher.
we where all shouting oh my god oh my god what is that, look at the shape of it ? what is it. now for myself after seeing that in the air i have to now believe something is in the skies flying around silently at night and it does not look like anything myself or the other witnesses had ever seen before.
content.summary: Orange red glowing object from west,  banked north, disc shapped belly

content.detailedDescription:
Vigorously flickering "star", shooting out plumes of light periodically, occasional colors (red and maybe yellow), visibly but slowly rising in the sky, maybe 15 degrees in 20 minutes, first noticed at about 45 degrees in the northeast sky.

i first noticed it closing the curtains before bed, noticed a star where i don't think i've ever seen one before, then noticed its flicker, colors, and pluming. especially notable because of the serious light pollution in downtown chicago; only the very brightest stars are ever visible.  mostly i felt pleasure and wonder.  my daughter confirmed its presence and appearance for me.  didn't so much lose sight of it as left it to write this report. it's still there, in fact, 10 mins later, has risen a few more degrees, moving up and easterly.
content.summary: Vigorously flickering star, noticeably moving, pluming light, changing colors

content.detailedDescription: We were outside watching for meteors as it's supposed to be a fantastic display tonite.  i saw a diamond or triangular moving shape in the sky - there were no lights on it, but it seemed to blocking out the starlights behind it - it seemed to be very high in the sky.  at first, i assumed it to be an airplane and thought i just couldn't see the running lights clearly as it was behind a very light cloud cover.  as it emerged from the cloud cover (traveling from the north to the south)i expected to see lights - there were none.  i pointed it out to my husband and kids, and no one else could tell what it was either...It was something we had never seen before.  the only illumination seemed to be a very faint reflection from the surrounding ambient light.  it took a turn to the southwest and we continued to watch as it moved across the sky.  it continued on to the southwest and we lost sight of it when it was at about 30 or 40 degrees above the horizon. it just got too faint to see.  the entire trip across the sky took about 2 minutes - movement was at a consistent speed. there was no sound, but we didn't expect any as it seem to be at a high altitude.  hard to judge the size, as we could not easily judge the altitude, but if it was as high up as it seemed, it would had to have been very large.
content.summary: Triangular or diamond shape moving across the sky - changed direction once - no lights

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside a little after 10:00 p.M. just staring up at the sky. it had been announced that there was a meteor shower that was supposed to take place tonight (august 11, 2009) so that's why i was out there. all of a sudden i looked over to the right and right above the tree line i saw a lighted object shoot straight up fairly high into the sky. then it quickly stopped and then proceeded to fly over me from right to left. it had both white and red flashing lights, and was in the shape of two triangles that were joined together. i knew it wasn't a plane/helicopter or anything of that sort. my first reaction was to call my boyfriend, who was the one who told me about the meteor shower in the first place. i described the object to him, and he confirmed that what i thought i saw was in fact a ufo.
content.summary: I was outside because of the meteor shower, saw this triangular object shoot vertically up, then across from right to left quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were traveling south on highway m69 in the upper peninsula of michigan. it was approximately 11pm central time in around 1986 when from the east, out of nowhere came this dark/black disc shaped object-it flew directly in front of our car, approximately 50-100feet from the car. it flew very slowly as it passed by us. we had stopped the car by this time. it then continued on west through an open field and disappeared as fast as it appeared. there was no sound, just lights. there were approximately 3-4 lights, which were bright. 

i wish today that i had had a camera at the time, as memory only lasts so-long. but i wanted to share this story in case someone else knows of a sighting in the same area. it was about 10-15 miles south of hardwood, michigan. 

when we first saw the object we all knew right away that it was definitely a ufo. no one else was on the highway at that time. my family consisted of my father, who was driving, my mother, my brother, and myself. i was about 12 years old at the time. it is something that has stuck in my memory ever since it happened. 

during the whole sighting, which lasted about five minutes or less, i remember all the hair on my neck sticking up...I had goosebumps and was really scared. after the object left our sight, i said to my family, "was that what i think it was?" my mother answered, "yes". we all saw it and still talk about it on occasion yet today. 

the only thing that the object did was come in fast from just over the tree-tops, to in front of our car. it slowly crossed the highway, in front of us and went into the field to the west and like a flash of lightning, it was gone! never to be seen again by any of us. 

i do think that there is other forms of life out there- who are we to think we are the only ones?? 

thanks for listening!
content.summary: Ufo flies in from east, right over highway in front of car, on to the west, and out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
This particular evening i was standing in a church parking lot next to an open field while walking my dog. i was facing west in the direction of the little league fields, the view of which is obstructed by  homes and a church.  the bright ballpark lights  illuminated the underbelly of the craft enough so that i could make out it's shape.  it seemed to have a stealth-like surface in that it was not shiney.  it had a curvature of that of an upside-down frisby, so that the edges were not hard angled, but curved up slightly.  there was nothing shiney, nor were there any lights from it.  there was no sound heard from it.  had the park lights not been lit, i would not have seen it at all.  

other times i've been there at night walking my dog, and i have noticed stars "dissappearing and reappearing", which i had concluded that perhaps it was caused by a flock of birds...Now i am not so sure about that reasoning. it could be the disks flying overhead.  a power plant would be in the direction of it's path only about two to three miles away.

end of message.
content.summary: The belly of the craft  illumined light reflection of ballpark lights as it flew overhead
